customer_reviews.title: One LOUD tool.

This one is just ok not thrilled.

customer_reviews.title: Best quality plate joiner for this price range
customer_reviews.text: This is no lamello, but at a fraction of the price, it gets the job done just as well. For those that like to point out the precision machining evident on the lamello, just remember this is just a plate joiner. This is a tool used by woodworkers to align boards for glue ups. The cordless feature is amazing. With a 5amp battery pack, it has enough power for any job.

customer_reviews.title: this monster doesn't bog like the corded ones
customer_reviews.text: I have the yellow corded one and the Makita corded one and now this one. Believe it or not, this monster doesn't bog like the corded ones. I couldn't believe it when I first used it. It's absolutely a pleasure to use. Pretty much all of my projects have biscuits now just so I get to use this puppy. Love it! Lastly, this is a tool-only version so you need your own batteries and charger. Battery drain is a non-issue. I never seem to need to cut more than a dozen or so biscuits for a project and by then I take the battery off to use on the orbital sander which is also awesome.

product_meta.title: Makita XJP03Z 18V LXT Lithium-Ion Cordless Plate Joiner
product_meta.description: Style:Bare Tool OnlyThe Makita 18V LXT Lithium-Ion Cordless Plate Joiner (model XJP03Z, tool only) provides portability and performance in the field or in the shop -- without the cord. The XJP03Z combines power and precision with ease-of-use features for strong and accurate biscuit joints for furniture making, cabinet construction and fine woodworking applications. (note: battery and charger sold separately). For improved tool performance and extended battery life, Makita created Star Protection Computer Controls. Star Protection is communication technology that allows the Star Protection-equipped tool and battery to exchange data in real time and monitor conditions during use to protect against overloading, over-discharging and overheating. For increased versatility, the tool can also be powered by Makita 18V LXT and Compact Lithium-Ion batteries with the star symbol on the battery indicating Star Protection inside. The XJP03Z provides up to 320 cuts or 160 joints on a single charge (18V LXT 3.0Ah battery, sold separately) . The rack-and-pinion vertical fence system is engineered for accurate fence adjustments, and the cast aluminum pivot fence has three positive stops at 0 degrees, 45 degrees, and 90 degrees. The blade diameter is 4 inches, and there are six depth settings with one-touch stops for the most common biscuit sizes including #0, #10 and #20.
feature_bullets: Rack-and-pinion vertical fence system engineered for accurate fence adjustments
Cast aluminum pivot fence with three positive stops at 0Degree, 45Degree and 90Degree, and easy centering on 3/4" material
Six depth settings with one-touch stops for #0, #10, and #20 and most common biscuits sizes
Cordless plate joiner provides portability and performance in the field or in the shop without the cord
Large and easy-to-operate cam locks for fence adjustments
Note: battery and charger sold separately
